results.title: 18" Doll Furniture Living Room Set Made To Fit American Girl 18" Dolls
results.description:
Please allow 10-14 days for shipping on furniture pieces.

This set in perfect for your American Girl Dolls.  It features a beautiful gray and yellow flower print fabric on the couch and chairs.  The cushions are made from 1" thick foam.  It comes with 3 black and white chevron print accent pillows and 2 gray and white polka dot accent pillows.

All pieces are made from solid wood pine and have been glued, nailed and screwed together so they will last a very long time!  The couch and chair have a slightly slanted back so the dolls can sit properly.  

Set includes:

Couch
Chair
Coffee Table
Side Table
Rug

This set can be done in any fabric.  Just send me a message!  Can be painted in just about any color you would like!

Shop.title: Clothes and Furniture for 18" American Girl Dolls
Shop.announcement:
All of my items are made at the time of purchase (unless listing states otherwise).  
Production time is 3-5 days for bedding and clothes.  Please allow 10 days for shipping of furniture items.  
All of my bedding sets can be made for single beds, bunk beds, and trundle beds.
Shop.sale_message: Thank you for your purchase.  I look forward to making this for you.
Shop.policy_welcome: Welcome to my shop!  I LOVE TO SEW!  I love sewing and my newest passion is making clothes, bedding and furniture for the American Girl doll (thanks to my wonderful niece, Olivia).
Shop.policy_payment: Payment is expected within 3 days of purchase.  I accept PayPal and Direct Payment from Etsy and money orders.  Money orders must be received within 7 days of purchase or I have the right to cancel the sale.
Shop.policy_shipping: I ship all items USPS with delivery confirmation.  Please see shop information for current production time.
Shop.policy_refunds: Refunds are only given if I have misrepresented an item or it has been damaged in the mail.  Shipping cost will not be refunded.  You must notify me within 2 days of receiving the item that something is wrong.  Item must be returned to me within 7 days and buyer pays return shipping cost.  I usually add insurance to all packages over $50.

results.title: Toy Car Track and Tote Play Mat immediate download of PDF SEWING PATTERN
results.description:
Quick to Make and Easy to Sew SEWING PATTERN; not a finished product.

Play mat and car carrier all in one- perfect for on the go busy little boys!  The two lane track play area measures 11” x 17”. Unique elastic pocket design holds three cars and keeps treasures safe.  Easy to use Velcro and tote handle make getting folded up and out the door a snap.

Sewing pattern features: 

• 15 pages of detailed instructions
• over 30 color photos and illustrations detailing pattern steps
• Full size ready to print track pattern

This pattern is available for immediate download as a pdf file.

All patterns from Pattern Play Designs are copyrighted. Patterns may be used for individual use and for small home based business. Any other use, including (but not limited to) selling patterns, selling modifications of the pattern, using the pattern for commercial promotion is strictly prohibited, and a violation of copyright law. If selling finished items please include origin of the pattern in listings.

Details:
format: PDF sewing pattern
difficulty: beginner (has completed some projects successfully)
fabric requirements: less than 1 yard
average time: 1-2 hr. hours

Shop.title: playful pdf sewing patterns
Shop.announcement:
Sewing patterns with very detailed photo instructions designed for those new to sewing who like to sew for kids.  Please enjoy browsing and let me know if you have any questions, Thanks!

FAQ: Can I sell the things I make with Pattern Play patterns?  Yup.  All rights are reserved but if you are personally planning on producing these in limited numbers for commercial sale- go for it.  My patterns are designed with you in mind- quick, easy and inexpensive to make.  (Just remember that reproducing, selling modifications of the pattern or selling the pattern itself are no-no's.)

Remember to "like" us above for current events and sales!

Don't forget to "like" Pattern Play on facebook for current events and sales and to share some of your finished works (I love to see them!)  http://www.facebook.com/PatternPlayDesigns.  

Thanks- Amy
Shop.policy_payment: Payment is welcome by paypal, money order or cashier's checks. Please no personal checks. At the time of payment please leave a little note in "message to seller" if you have special instructions or requests. International purchases are welcome but payment with paypal only please.
Shop.policy_shipping: A link to patterns is sent via e-mail as soon as the payment clears.  Links are sent to the email on file with Etsy.  PDF files will need a PDF reader (like Adobe) to download.
Shop.policy_refunds: Due to the nature of the items no refunds or exchanges will be accepted.  However the beauty of purchasing from a small business is that I am here to answer questions.  If something seems confusing please just send me a quick email and we will try to work through it together.  If you feel the pattern you purchased was grossly misrepresented or faulty please contact me immediately.
Shop.policy_additional:
Hey!  You never sent my pattern!  Where is it?
Technology is picky and needs to be exact; an extra keystroke in the email address, a .com instead of .net, a firewall not accepting the pattern attachement... there are tons of reasons.  If your pattern did not arrive please send me a convo to let me know and we will figure it out.

Copyrights/ Reselling:  I want to make these to sell at a craft fair and put on my website- is that okay?
All patterns purchased here are for personal use AND the completed projects may be used for commercial sale by small home-based business owners.  Patterns themselves may not be reproduced or distributed in any way.  When selling a finished product of Pattern Play Designs please give a nod back to the origin of the design with a simple "created from pattern by Pattern Play" in the listing.

I have a question, can I email you?
I ask that all communication initially be done through Etsy convos since I check my convos more frequently and would hate to miss your question.  

Do you do Wholesale and Bulk Orders?
Hard copies of my patterns can be made for resale.  Please contact me for wholesale or bulk order pricing.

Can I use your photos on my website? (ie Copyrights)
All images, text, products, ideas, logo, and designs are copyrighted. Nothing within www.patternplay.etsy.com or www.aebaby.etsy.com is free or public domain with out consent.  So in other words, just ask.
Shop.vacation_autoreply: Thank you for your interest in pattern play.  The shop is currently closed and will reopen on Monday January 15.  We are out of town but I will reply to your convo as soon as we return!  Thanks.

results.title: Sam the Snake
results.description:
SALE - Was $8

Sam has been frankensteined together using scraps of red pvc vinyl, and a fake snake skin print left over from a suit I made for my brother. The uneven pieces used to make him makes him wiggly-squiggly just like a real snake.

Sam is a machine stitched tube filled with magical stuffed animal guts (poleyester fiberfill) and he has red patchwork stitches along all of his seams on his body, except for his tummy.

He has googly eyes and a cute little red nose. He also has a tattoo on his side, a pair of hearts in red and snake skin.

he measures 25 inches long and between 3 and 1/2 and 5 inches around, depending on where you measure.

He's named after Sam Witwicky from Transformers, because he was created while I was watching it. :D

Shop.title: Restlessly Random
Shop.announcement:
Welcome to the Wonderful World of Random.  Look around, there's a little bit of everything, and I hope you find something that appeals to you!

I believe I have finally gotten all of my listings available for international shipping, but if you find one that is just US, please contact me for an international shipping rate. 

Please see my Store Policies for all additional information!

Feel free to convo or email me if you have any questions or requests.
Shop.sale_message:
Thank you for your order! If you have any further questions please contact me through conversation or email vodkavases@yahoo.com!

thanks
RR
Shop.policy_welcome:
Restlessly Random Designs

it describes me to a 'T'.  An old friend referred to me as restlessly random, and when discussing the possibility of running our own craft store another friend and I thought it would be the perfect name.

The friend and I never caught that dream together, but I think that I have.  She has gone on to her own artistic endevors, but there are pieces of her in just about everything I create.  The wall may have been rebuilt between our respective worlds, but the door still stands open.
Shop.policy_payment: I accept Paypal, personal checks, and money orders.  paypal invoices will come from Vodkavases@yahoo.com.
Shop.policy_shipping:
Shipping costs include a handling/packaging fee of approximately a dollar.  If an item is light enough it is shipped first class mail as it is generally only a day longer for a lot less money.  Things like dolls, pictures, scarves, tshirts, etc can be expected with first class.

I will cover any underpayment in shipping (my mistake after all) and refund any overages that meet a doller or more.

I will happily upgrade or downgrade depending on your choices and delivery confirmation is available for an extra 50 cents (please add the listing for the delivery confirmation from my shop).  Any items that have free shipping are shipped first class.

International orders are welcome, please do not complete shipping and i will personalize your price and send you a new invoice.

Discounts are offered for combined shipping.  Simply wait for an adjusted invoice.
Shop.policy_refunds:
returns will be accepted within 30 days and refunds will be issued less shipping cost.

i am not responsible for loss by the postal service, delivery confirmation is your choice.  i package everything securely and if any damage should occur under normal delivery wear and tear i will gladly repair or replace your item, but since many of my supplies are one of a kind there will be differences.
Shop.policy_additional: custom orders are welcome and encouraged.  Anything I make can be redone in your color choice or size or other prefrences.

results.title: Mini Sock Monkey
results.description:
This monkey is made from toddler socks so he's much smaller than the usual sock monkeys i make. 

He is white with lots of stripes of colors on his arms and legs. His eyes are buttons and his mouth is stitched (if you would like to give this to a baby and would prefer soft, fleece eyes i can easily change it at no charge; please let me know at checkout) He is about 10 inches long from the top of his head to his toes. He is entirely hand stitched and stuffed with polyester fiberfill.

results.title: Sock Hippo
results.description:
a great pair of striped ankle socks have now become a little snuggly hippo. She is machine stitched with limb and whatnot attachment by hand. Her eyes are two clearish blueish flowerish buttons. She is filled with polyester fiber fill. she is 3.5 inches tall (from front toes to ear tips) and 8 inches long (from nose to tiny tail)

these hippos can be made to order. do you want one a different color, perhaps in argyle (which looks awesome as a hippo!) just ask!

results.title: Snoopy stuffed animal, FREE STANDARD SHIPPING
results.description:
Crochet stuffed animal great for baby, child or just because you gotta have it!  It measures 8" tall and 6" wide and is crafted in a smoke free home.  The eyes are made with yarn, so no small parts to swallow.  Spot cleaning is recommended to ensure its original shape.
*Note...I do not claim ownership of this pattern.  The pattern was available free on the internet and my own touches were added to make it unique.  Thanks for looking!!

Shop.title: Crochet crafts
Shop.announcement: My creations are all crafted using high quality yarns in a smoke free home. I learned to crochet when I was a child and have been “hooked” ever since! I enjoy taking a simple skein of yarn and creating something special to give as a gift, wear yourself, or just simply admire. I hope you enjoy them too!! STANDARD SHIPPING IS ALWAYS FREE!
Shop.sale_message: Thank you for your purchase!  Your item will be shipped within 72 hours via USPS unless otherwise noted in item description.
Shop.policy_payment: Once payment is received your item will be shipped within 1-3 business days.
Shop.policy_shipping: Shipping via USPS to US only
Shop.policy_refunds: No returns accepted.

results.title: Tooth Fairy, Cookie Jar or Flower Pot- Paint It Yourself- DIY Unfinshed Wooden Pot
results.description:
Do you have a little artist in your family?  My kids love painting my wooden pieces, which gave me the idea of sharing this fun with you.  These unique box designs can be used as tooth fairy boxes, cookie jar, pretend play, flower pot and are great accessories for desks and tables. 
 
Included Items:
4- Quality acrylic paint colors.  You choose four paint colors from the fifth picture.
1- Paint brush
1- Ribbon to tie around pot
1- Wooden pot with lid
1- Heavy duty cotton drawstring bag

A piece of newspaper, napkin and a little water will complete your child's art project.  These make excellent personalized gifts to give to others from your child.  Add a small zip lock bag of potting soil, a packet of flower seeds, your child's creativity and you have an awesome gift!

Thank you for taking the time to look at my DIY wooden art painting.  I hope you'll come back to see what Toying Around comes up with next.

Shop.title: Toying Around- "Its a Kid Thing"  Hand Painted Toys
Shop.announcement:
This toy shop is open to fulfill your child's learning and creativity with each of my hand painted toys, activities and games.  Enjoy watching your child play for hours with my unqiue wooden toys.  All my wooden toys are hand painted with non toxic acrylic paint and sealed with two layers of a non toxic protective top coat sealer.  I welcome all custom order and all "childish" ideas. 

Toying Around is new to Etsy, however- I'am not.  I have sold over 400 items and have over 200 happy customer reviews in my other Etsy shop HobKnobin.  I encourage you to  read my positive feed back ... www.hobknobin.etsy.com- add me to your circle or favorites to see my latest and greatest hand painted items.

Thank you for stopping by my toy shop,  I look forward to hand painting the perfect wooden toy for you.
Shop.vacation_message: Thank you visiting Toying Around.  My family and I are in the process of moving our home to another state.  I look forward to fullfilling your order in my new dedicated Toying Around Room.  I'm excited about this move because in our new home I will have my  own dedicated room to create new toys, games and activities for Toying Around.  I'll keep you updated on here as to when I will be open for business again.
Shop.sale_message:
Thank you for your order!  If you are happy with your purchase, please take the time to leave me a review on Etsy feedback section.  If for some reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact me so we can work out a solution.  Thank you and I look forward to working with you again.  Come back and enter the code "Kidsz" upon check out to receive 10% off your next order.

 Be sure to check out my other hand painted Etsy shop www.hobknobin.etsy.com.  Add me to your favorites or circle.
Shop.policy_welcome: This shop was created from the inner child in me.  Keeping quality in mind, I created each piece as if my children where receiving them as a gift.  I'm bringing back what toys used to be all about, durability, eco- friendly, no batteries or loud noises, just the imagination and steam power of your child.  I welcome all "childish" ideas and look forward to hand painting the perfect wooden toy for you!
Shop.policy_payment: I accept, Paypal and all major credit cards, which are processed through Etsy and Personal Checks.  Please note that all payment must be cleared before I will start painting your order.
Shop.policy_shipping: I ship all items first class mail, which will reach you in 3-5 business days.  If you would like them sooner, please have me quote you a price for priority mail, which will reach you in about 2-3 business days.  International orders, please note if you do not purchase insurance or tracking information there is no way for me to track your package.  Most international shipments take 6-10 business days, however- I have seen it take up to a month.
Shop.policy_refunds: I hope you are satisfied with your purchase, however if you are not here are my return policies.  With custom orders I will not accept any refunds.  Custom orders are anything you do not see in my shop.  For all other returns they must be sent in the original condition and returned within 7 business days of the date you received the package.  Return shipping cost are at your expense. To avoid all returns, communication is key!
Shop.policy_additional: If you are satisfied with your transaction, please leave me feedback.
Shop.vacation_autoreply:
Hello~

Thank you for contacting Toying Around.  We are in the process of moving our home from Colorado to Idaho.  I'm super excited about this move because I will have my own dedicated room for Toying Around.  More roommeans more ideas for Toying Around and my other Etsy shop HobKnobin.  If you e-mail me on here I'll be and sure to get back to you.  Well its off to packing.

Thank you,
Shyla
Toying Around
HobKnobin

results.title: Village People - Set of 13 Wooden Rainbow Dolls
results.description:
The Village People are back! Everyone has fun when they play with the Village People set! 

A wonderful addition to any classroom,  home or play space. Open ended, with no facial details and lots of room for imaginative, kid-powered play!

These dolls make great therapy tools, too!

You'll receive thirteen hand painted wooden people in various sizes and shapes and beautifully vibrant colors. Items arrive in a handmade organic cotton drawstring bag, perfect for storage and travel! 

Painted using eco-friendly water-based soy paints.  Pieces are lightly finished in a planet and people safe handmade organic beeswax and coconut oil polish for many years of play.

No acrylics, petroleum based ingredients or chemicals were used in these items, so you can have peace of mind when your child uses them!

Colors may vary slightly from those shown based on availability. 

The Village People set makes a great addition to the Rainbow Village set! Listed separately.

Shop.title: The Rainbow Shop
Shop.sale_message: Thank you for your purchase!
Shop.policy_payment: Paypal is the preferred method for payment, however I also offer the Etsy Direct payment for your convenience.
Shop.policy_shipping:
I use the USPS for most all orders unless you request a different carrier. I will gladly create a custom listing to include the updated shipping charges for your preferred delivery service.

In most cases, I ship with delivery confirmation. Items are usually not insured. You may request additional coverage for your item prior to shipment. The buyer is responsible for additional fees for this coverage.
Shop.policy_refunds:
I will gladly accept returns and issue a refund only if the items has been terribly, grossly, disfiguringly misrepresented! In the event that an item has been terribly, grossly, murderously misrepresented, I will refund the purchase amount that you paid for the item, as soon as I receive the returned item. I DO NOT REFUND SHIPPING COSTS. 

The return shipping costs are the BUYER’S RESPONSIBILITY—not mine. This means that if you choose to return an item, you will pay the shipping costs to ship it back to me. I will refund your purchase amount ONLY AFTER I receive the item and ONLY if it is in the same condition as when shipped.

results.title: Wooden Lacing Toy, Wooden Ship Toy
results.description:
ITEM DETAILS

Type: Wooden lacing ship toy.
Parts: 4 (including lace)
Size: 12x11x1.5cm (4.72x4.33x0.59inch)
Color: yellow, green, natural wood.
Condition: brand new

♥ ♥ ♥ 

Lacing toy develops child's small motor skills and finger muscles, patience. Also it is thick enough to stand on a shelf as a decoration. They are completely safe for your child - made from real wood, colored with organic dyes. 

For kids aged 3 years and over.

We do not recommend using these toys when playing with the water or placing painted toys to the mouth.

Made in line with EU standards

Furniture by Quietude Quilts is high quality real furniture in miniature, perfect for newborn and child photography, or heirloom toys for children, used with or without our bedding and accessories. Beds:
- Approximately 24" x 12" x 18" tall

- Highest quality clear pine, FSC certified sustainably harvested, solid wood

- No nails, screws, metal, or plastic make this a natural heirloom toy
- Shipped flat with 5 minute simple assembly, directions included

- Handmade in our smoke free, pet free home workshop

ALSO INCLUDES:
- Choose your custom mattresses from our fabric chart of 20 colors

Shop.policy_welcome: Welcome to Quietude Quilts, LLC! We are a young husband and wife team woodworking and quilting heirloom toys for your children and photography props for your newborns. We are recently reopened after welcoming our first baby this spring! Thank you for making QQ a top 20 toy shop on Etsy!
Shop.policy_shipping:
SHIPPING SCHEDULE
All orders ship on FRIDAYS.  Orders placed through Wednesdays ship on the closest Friday; orders placed on Thursdays and Fridays ship the following week.  Painted furniture always ships the following week to allow custom painting time.  We are not currently offering rush orders or rush shipping.  Note: If you pay using PAYPAL, we ship to your address as listed in PayPal.

CAN YOU RUSH MY ORDER?
No, we are not currently offering rush orders or rush shipping. 

CAN I TRACK MY ORDER?
Yes, you will receive a shipping confirmation and tracking number sent to the email address you have on file with Etsy.  

DO YOU SHIP INTERNATIONALLY?
Yes, we have sent packages to over 30 countries!  Most items have international shipping prices listed, or please ask for a quote.

CAN YOU SHIP MY ITEMS TOGETHER FOR LESS?
Yes, usually when you purchase multiple items, shipping is automatically discounted and combined.  

CAN I ADD INSURANCE?
Yes, please ask for an adjusted shipping quote if you would like to add insurance to your package.  We do NOT normally include insurance.  In the extremely unlikely event of a lost or stolen package (this has happened only once in 3,000+ packages), Quietude Quilts cannot be responsible for replacing the missing items.  If you feel more peace of mind by having your item insured, it is usually just a couple dollars for most items.
Shop.policy_additional:
ARE ALL COLORS, QUANTITIES, AND ITEMS IN STOCK AND READY TO SHIP?
Yes, and no.  All furniture is in stock and if you purchase painting will be painted to your selection.  A small amount of every bedding item is also in stock, but if you select a high quantity of identical items, extra production time may be required and we will contact you if this will affect your shipping time.

DO YOU TAKE RETURNS?
No, not normally but we understand there can be extenuating circumstances.  We can not take returns of furniture that has been assembled.

DO YOU TAKE CUSTOM ORDERS?
No, we are not currently offering custom orders. 

DO YOU SELL WHOLESALE?
No, we are not currently offering wholesale orders.

DO YOU SEND FREE ITEMS TO PHOTOGRAPHERS OR GIVE DISCOUNTS IN EXCHANGE FOR PHOTOS?
No, and yes.  Our primary customers are photographers and many of them are so kind to send us amazing photos of our products in use.  After you become one of our customers and share photos using our props, our relationship often develops towards future great discounts and possible photo/prop exchanges.

Photographers, thank you for your generosity and sharing that helps us keep our prices so affordable!  When you post, tag, email, or message your beautiful photos using our products to us or our facebook page, you allow Quietude Quilts to use them in advertising or our shop.  

DO YOU OFFER COUPONS ON YOUR FURNITURE?
No, but we do offer occasional coupons for bedding and other items.  Any coupons should always include the information that they do not apply to our beds, but we're posting that policy here in case it is ever accidentally omitted.  Thank you for understanding the time that our handcrafted woodworking takes and that we keep our prices as low as possible for everyday.  Coupons also do not apply to customized orders, items being held on reserve, or past orders.

results.title: Custom Plush

 The main and second photo is a Yellow/Green/Blue (Lemonsnout). The third photo is a purple/dk.blue/pink, the and the last is blue/lt.green/green. The colours are in Body/Stomach/Eyes format and can do other colours as well if requested, for no additional costs.

results.description: This wooden teething ring is of birch. I finish it with oil and beeswax (can request it unfinished). I will personalize it however you like with a woodburning.

Shop.title: Mama Made Them
Shop.announcement:
I make handcrafted wooden toys. It's important to me to have toys that will last and still look good ten years from now. I prefer not to paint and instead use different types of wood to achieve different colors. I believe in nice, rounded corners and edges. I like to make toys with simple designs that won't break easily. Toys should be beautiful, durable, and natural.

Check out my blog: www.mamamadethem.wordpress.com for giveaways, reviews, recipes, plus everything you ever wanted to know about your toymaker!

Enjoy!
Shop.vacation_message: Hi, I'm on vacation until June 27. I'll be checking in, but I won't be able to ship anything until I got back. -mamamadeit
Shop.sale_message:
Hi, Thank you so much for your business. 

Check out my blog at www.mamamadethem.wordpress.com. I giveaway a free toy every month.

Sincerely,
Cheryl at Mama Made Them
Shop.policy_welcome:
Hi! It's my passion to make natural, lasting toys that your kids can pass down to their kids. Wooden toys, made from hard woods, will last as long as they are taken care of, but they can also decay and return to the earth once they are no longer wanted.

What do we believe?

-toys should be open-ended, multi-use
-they should be quality
-they should be nontoxic
-toys should last as long as you want them to, and then return to the earth to nourish the trees
-they should be beautiful

A child can incorporate an open-ended toy into his or her play in multiple ways (blocks can be anything, figures can act out any scene, etc.). A closed-ended toy only has one purpose (i.e. press this button, hear this song, watch this light up).

Open-ended toys encourage:
-Imagination
-Creativity
-Work (think Tonka trucks in the sandbox versus Bob the Builder computer game)
-Ingenuity
-producing, rather than consuming (open-ended toys can be used over and over again in many different ways)
Shop.policy_shipping: I ship with USPS. You may request expedited shipping, and I can invoice you for the difference.
Shop.policy_refunds: I want you to be as happy with our toys as I were making them. If anything is a problem, I’ll fix it or replace it.
Shop.policy_additional:
I love doing custom orders. Some of my favorite items came from custom orders.

My wholesale policies are as follows: 40% discount with an order of at least 5 of each item, with a $250 minimum order. Also if you want to order 10 or more of just one item, I will give you a 20% discount without ordering $250 worth of toys.
Shop.vacation_autoreply: Hi, I'm on vacation until June 27. I'll be checking in, but I won't be able to ship anything until I got back. Thanks for your interest -Cheryl at mamamadeit

results.title: Ring Stacker Soft Toy, immediate download of pdf sewing pattern - free shipping
results.description:
Sewing Pattern- this is not a finished toy.  

You can create a rainbow of stacking rings to help baby develop fine motor skills and spark curiosity! This classic ring stacker pattern gives detailed instructions for five rings in graduated sizes looped over an 8-inch-tall post.  A perfect toy to help baby develop coordination as they learn to stack the easy-to-grasp rings in the proper order.  Made by you so it is a great safe and washable alternative to painted or plastic toys! 

Seven pages of detailed instructions with over 20 color illustrations and photos to create this classic toy!  This pattern is great for those newer to sewing as there is only one curved seam to sew on the base.  Hand sewing is kept to a minimum so construction goes quicker!  Full size patterns included. 

This sewing pattern is ready for you and will be available for immediate download as a PDF file.    All rights reserved by Pattern Play 2010, this pattern may not be redistributed or reproduced in any form. There is no copyright on creations for the small home-based business as long as you are planning to personally create these toys.

Details:
format: PDF sewing pattern
difficulty: medium - advanced beginner (has completed some projects successfully)
fabric requirements: 1-2 yards
average time: 2 hours

Shop.title: playful pdf sewing patterns
Shop.announcement:
Sewing patterns with very detailed photo instructions designed for those new to sewing who like to sew for kids.  Please enjoy browsing and let me know if you have any questions, Thanks!

FAQ: Can I sell the things I make with Pattern Play patterns?  Yup.  All rights are reserved but if you are personally planning on producing these in limited numbers for commercial sale- go for it.  My patterns are designed with you in mind- quick, easy and inexpensive to make.  (Just remember that reproducing, selling modifications of the pattern or selling the pattern itself are no-no's.)

Remember to "like" us above for current events and sales!

Shop.policy_payment: Payment is welcome by paypal, money order or cashier's checks. Please no personal checks. At the time of payment please leave a little note in "message to seller" if you have special instructions or requests. International purchases are welcome but payment with paypal only please.
Shop.policy_shipping: A link to patterns is sent via e-mail as soon as the payment clears.  Links are sent to the email on file with Etsy.  PDF files will need a PDF reader (like Adobe) to download.
Shop.policy_refunds: Due to the nature of the items no refunds or exchanges will be accepted.  However the beauty of purchasing from a small business is that I am here to answer questions.  If something seems confusing please just send me a quick email and we will try to work through it together.  If you feel the pattern you purchased was grossly misrepresented or faulty please contact me immediately.
Shop.policy_additional:
Hey!  You never sent my pattern!  Where is it?
Technology is picky and needs to be exact; an extra keystroke in the email address, a .com instead of .net, a firewall not accepting the pattern attachement... there are tons of reasons.  If your pattern did not arrive please send me a convo to let me know and we will figure it out.

Copyrights/ Reselling:  I want to make these to sell at a craft fair and put on my website- is that okay?
All patterns purchased here are for personal use AND the completed projects may be used for commercial sale by small home-based business owners.  Patterns themselves may not be reproduced or distributed in any way.  When selling a finished product of Pattern Play Designs please give a nod back to the origin of the design with a simple "created from pattern by Pattern Play" in the listing.

Shop.policy_additional:
FREQUESTLY ASKED QUESTIONS~

Here you will find a list of the most common inquiries we receive.  If you do not see what you are looking for, please message us or call 785.856.HOOP!  
 
WHAT SIZE HOOP SHOULD I CHOOSE?
When choosing a hoop, we usually recommend that you measure from the ground up to about 1-2” above your belly button. Some beginners like hoops around belly button height and some like larger hoops, all the way up to chest height.   Beginners will appreciate larger hoops so if this is your first hoop, remember that bigger is better!  The larger a hoop is, the slower it will rotate around the body, making learning new moves easier.   As you become more comfortable with hooping and are starting to build up a repertoire of tricks, you may want to slowly downsize to a smaller hoop for increased range of moves and faster speeds.  If you are a new hooper who is still unsure of the size of hoop that’s right for you, please message, call or email us your height and weight to info@hoopmamas.net and we will recommend a size for you. 

SHOULD I CHOOSE 100psi (Standard) or 160psi (Heavyweight)?
We usually recommend 100psi because it is the current standard weight in Hoopdance Hoops, but here are some other helpful guidelines:

*Reasons to choose the 160psi weight:  
     ~You have tried a friend's hoop, but can't seem to keep it up successfully.
     ~You are heavy-set or large framed and are looking for a hoop for weight loss.
     ~You are interested in waist hooping for exercise, but not necessarily any body tricks and moves.

*Reasons to choose the 100psi weight:
     ~You have successfully waist hooped with a friend's hoop.
     ~You are naturally athletic and learn new activities easily.
     ~You are interested in learning the tricks & moves associated with Hoopdance.
     
Sidenote:  There has always been talk of a heavier hoop being a better workout, although this is absolutely untrue.  The heavier the hoop, the slower it roates, making it easier to learn on, but in turn burning less calories.  The faster your body has to move with a hoop, the better workout making lighter hoops (100psi) actually better for exercise.

WILL I BE ABLE TO HOOP WITH YOUR HOOPS?
YES!!!  All Hoop Mamas Hoops are constructed of weighted tubing that is heavier and much larger than ‘your mama’s hoops’!  These larger, heavier hoops will rotate around the body much slower, allowing everyone to be successful!  We also use grip tape on every one of our hoops which allows the hoop to literally stick to your hips!  No matter your size, weight, athletic ability OR sense of rhythm, you’ll be able to spin Hoop Mamas hoops!   

HOW SHOULD I CARE FOR MY NEW HOOP?
Our hoops are durable and professionally constructed so they should last a long time with proper care.  

*Most important is WHERE you hoop.  If you hoop on grass, carpet, wood flooring or any other soft or smooth surface your hoop will be less likely to get scratched or damaged when it falls to the ground.  (And it WILL drop as you are learning)!  If your hoop is used on concrete, gravel or any other rough surface, it is likely to appear worn more quickly.  

*Temperature is also important.  Hoops are made of plastic and when they get warm they can lose their shape.  Never leave your hoop in a hot car or outside on a hot day.  If this does occur, it's okay!  Hoops can be re-shaped!  Allow the hoop to warm up in the sunshine then take the hoop indoors to set on the floor.  Treat your hoop kindly and it should bring you joy for a long, long time!

All images on this site are the intellectual property of Alison Fitzgerald & Hoop Mamas, LLC. Personal or Commercial use is prohibited.  All Rights Reserved © Hoop Mamas LLC.

results.title: Traditional Sock Monkey Doll with Hat
results.description:
Sock Monkey Doll -  

Made to order with a creation to shipment period of 5 business days.

**Now available to personalize - see the drop down menu to the right.

Due to the monkeys eyes, this toy is not suitable for babies or smaller children.

~*~ Materials ~*~

Large Original Rockford Red Heel Socks

Polyfil Fluffy Stuff

Upholstery Thread

Cotton yarn (neck)

Classic 4 hole buttons (eyes)

Wool Blend Felt (hearts)

Grossgrain Ribbon


~*~ Measurements ~*~

About - 18" from head to foot with a 12" tail.

~*~Details~*~

Sewn by machine and hand; all seams are double stitched using double thread. Ears are stitched and slightly stuffed for added detail.

His hat and bow are removable - heart is sewn to his chest.

Monkeys come with a handcrafted gift card that hangs from their neck.

~*~Payment, Refunds, Exchanges ~*~

Please see my shop policies regarding accepted forms of payment and returns/ refunds/ exchanges.
http://www.etsy.com/shop/MonkeyBizz/policy?ref=shopinfo_policies_leftnav

~*~ Shipping ~*~

I usually ship within 5 business days of receiving cleared payment. Sock Monkeys ship USPS Priority with tracking.


Thank you so much for taking the time to look at my work.

Shop.title: Classic Handmade Toys, Dolls, and Quilts
Shop.announcement:
Thank you for stopping by my boutique of classic handmade toys; sock monkeys, hobby horses, wooden dolls, and accessories.

Due to my holiday schedule, custom orders will be limited from October 13th, 2013 - January 1st, 2014.  This does not include personalization's added to sock monkeys and horses.

I would love for you to stop by my Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/SockMonkeyBizz where I list all new items, announce promotions, and show a little behind the scenes of my craft.
Shop.sale_message:
Hello there, 

Thank you so much for your order.  I will be contacting you shortly with an expected ship date and shipping information.  I send a packing slip with your order however, because a large majority of my orders are gifts - I do not include an invoice.  If you would like for me to include a paper invoice as well, please contact me and I will be sure to accommodate your request.

Again, many many thanks.
Best regards, 
Dory
Shop.policy_welcome: Hello - Welcome to Sock Monkey Bizz!!
Shop.policy_payment: I currently accept payment through Direct Checkout and/ or Paypal only.
Shop.policy_shipping:
Insurance is added to all purchases over $25.00.  

All of my items are professionally packaged and ready to gift.  Please discard protective plastic before giving dolls and/ or hobby horses to a child.

Monkeys and Bears - ship USPS Priority Mail with confirmation number.  You should receive this number via email.  If you do not receive this email, please 'convo' me and I will resend it to you.

Hobby/ Stick Horses will ship USPS Regular Parcel Post - Priority shipping is unavailable on hobby horses due to their size.

**Shipping overages over the price to ship + shipping supplies ($1.50) will be refunded.

Clothespin Dolls, Peg Dolls, and Quilts - ship USPS First Class.
Shop.policy_refunds:
I accept returns within 30 days given -

- Items must be in original condition and packaging.
- A tracking number/ delivery confirmation must be provided.
- Initial and secondary shipping charges will not refunded.

I cannot accept returns/ refunds/ exchanges on custom orders or personalized items including names/ initials.
Shop.policy_additional:
**All items are made in my smoke and pet/ animal free home.

Custom and Reserved listings should be purchased within 72 hours of listing date; otherwise, the listing will be deactivated or opened for public purchase.  

Have a question??  Please feel free to contact me.  I return emails, usually within the hour, from 5:00 am - 10:00 pm U.S. Central Time.  Messages received outside this time frame will be answered as soon as possible.

results.title: Dinosaur Animal Set  Wooden Block Toys for Children Kids Toddlers Girls Boys Birthday Gift Stocking stuffers
results.description: Seven wooden dinosaur toys and a fiery volcano are attractively packaged in a 7.5"(19cm)x 5.5"(14cm)x1"(2.7cm) view box. Enjoy a T Rex, Brontosaurus, Triceratops, Stegosaurus,Protoceratops, Velociraptor, and Spoonbill. They are all made in Trumansburg NY, USA from carefully selected hardwoods and are sturdy enough to be enjoyed for many years of imaginative, creative play. Animals are 5/8" (17mm) thick and range in height from 1 3/4" (44mm) to 4 1/8" (105mm); ages 2 years and up.
materials: cardboard box with clear acrylic lid

Shop.title: Wooden Folkart and Whimsical Toy Animals
Shop.announcement: For 30 years we make American folk art with a European touch and whimsical wooden animal toys, organic and durable. Here in Trumansburg, NY we craft playthings, which encourage imaginative and creative activity. Our work is in the permanent collection of the Toy Museum in Nuremberg Germany, and the Hartsvill Museum in Hartsville, NY. It has also been displayed in the "Toys for all Ages" show at the Smithsonian and more recently at the "Objects for Use/ Handmade by Design" show at the American Craft Museum in New York City. We are inspired by the woods all around us and all the creatures who live in it homo sapiens included
Shop.policy_welcome: Thank you for checking out our Etsy store. We love to create artful toys and appreciate your interest in our products.
Shop.policy_payment: We accept Visa, MasterCard, Paypal, checks and money orders.
Shop.policy_shipping:
We ship orders via UPS ground and USPS first class and priority mail. Smaller items usually can be shipped at lower cost with USPS. If you require insurance or tracking for USPS packages, we will add the extra cost.
The shipping cost we quote in the Etsy Store are estimated prices. We will never charge you more, but often less, unless you request special services. A package to Pennsylvania costs less than to California. Customers from NY State have to pay 8%
Sales tax. International orders we ship with US Postal Services, unless you request other carriers.
Orders will be shipped within three working days or earlier except during November and December, when it could take 5 working days. If we are unable to meet our usual deadline, we will contact you. So please give us your e mail address or telephone number and we will let you know our anticipated shipping date.
Shop.policy_refunds: Customers tell us that our products are better than they expected. But if for some reason you are dissatisfied, we will accept exchanges or returns for a refund minus credit card and Etsy cost within ten working days.

results.title: Crochet Pear
results.description:
Crochet Pear Amigurumi. 

Amigurumi are usually crocheted out of yarn using the single crochet stitch. The word is derived from a combination of the Japanese words ami, meaning crocheted or knitted, and nuigurumi, meaning stuffed doll.

Pear is hand crocheted out of golden yellow and brown acrylic yarn and stuffed with 100% polyester fiberfill. 

Approximately 6 inches

Toy is child safe and machine washable.

This item is made to order. Crafted in a smoke-free/pet-free home. Please allow 1 week after payment is confirmed for shipment. (It will probably ship sooner). Please see policies section for any further shipping questions.

results.title: Black and White or Red and White Horizontal Stripe Tent and Mat, Tent, Kids Teepee, Play Tent Made to Order
results.description:
This is a made to order black and white stripe childrens teepee, tent, wigwam, tepee, or play fort.  Now offering several other options in colors please see the listing choices and the last picture in the listing. This is not a teeny tiny tent it is large enough inside to accommodate 3 children comfortably.

This teepee includes 1 1/2" wide black and white stripe twill fabric for the main body fabric and sleeves.  Note in order to make this tent this tall a horizontal seam on the main panels is required.

This teepee will measure approximately 54"x 54" inside at the base  by 5 feet tall.  With poles this teepee will be 6'5" tall.  As with all tent sold in my shop poles are included when shipped to the United States and Canada.  

We ship internationally without poles, start a conversation with us and we will quote shipping prices for you instructions for making the poles will be included with your order.

Shop.policy_additional:
FREQUESTLY ASKED QUESTIONS~

Here you will find a list of the most common inquiries we receive.  If you do not see what you are looking for, please message us or call 785.856.HOOP!  
 
WHAT SIZE HOOP SHOULD I CHOOSE?
When choosing a hoop, we usually recommend that you measure from the ground up to about 1-2” above your belly button. Some beginners like hoops around belly button height and some like larger hoops, all the way up to chest height.   Beginners will appreciate larger hoops so if this is your first hoop, remember that bigger is better!  The larger a hoop is, the slower it will rotate around the body, making learning new moves easier.   As you become more comfortable with hooping and are starting to build up a repertoire of tricks, you may want to slowly downsize to a smaller hoop for increased range of moves and faster speeds.  If you are a new hooper who is still unsure of the size of hoop that’s right for you, please message, call or email us your height and weight to info@hoopmamas.net and we will recommend a size for you. 

SHOULD I CHOOSE 100psi (Standard) or 160psi (Heavyweight)?
We usually recommend 100psi because it is the current standard weight in Hoopdance Hoops, but here are some other helpful guidelines:

*Reasons to choose the 160psi weight:  
     ~You have tried a friend's hoop, but can't seem to keep it up successfully.
     ~You are heavy-set or large framed and are looking for a hoop for weight loss.
     ~You are interested in waist hooping for exercise, but not necessarily any body tricks and moves.

*Reasons to choose the 100psi weight:
     ~You have successfully waist hooped with a friend's hoop.
     ~You are naturally athletic and learn new activities easily.
     ~You are interested in learning the tricks & moves associated with Hoopdance.
     
Sidenote:  There has always been talk of a heavier hoop being a better workout, although this is absolutely untrue.  The heavier the hoop, the slower it roates, making it easier to learn on, but in turn burning less calories.  The faster your body has to move with a hoop, the better workout making lighter hoops (100psi) actually better for exercise.

WILL I BE ABLE TO HOOP WITH YOUR HOOPS?
YES!!!  All Hoop Mamas Hoops are constructed of weighted tubing that is heavier and much larger than ‘your mama’s hoops’!  These larger, heavier hoops will rotate around the body much slower, allowing everyone to be successful!  We also use grip tape on every one of our hoops which allows the hoop to literally stick to your hips!  No matter your size, weight, athletic ability OR sense of rhythm, you’ll be able to spin Hoop Mamas hoops!   

HOW SHOULD I CARE FOR MY NEW HOOP?
Our hoops are durable and professionally constructed so they should last a long time with proper care.  

*Most important is WHERE you hoop.  If you hoop on grass, carpet, wood flooring or any other soft or smooth surface your hoop will be less likely to get scratched or damaged when it falls to the ground.  (And it WILL drop as you are learning)!  If your hoop is used on concrete, gravel or any other rough surface, it is likely to appear worn more quickly.  

*Temperature is also important.  Hoops are made of plastic and when they get warm they can lose their shape.  Never leave your hoop in a hot car or outside on a hot day.  If this does occur, it's okay!  Hoops can be re-shaped!  Allow the hoop to warm up in the sunshine then take the hoop indoors to set on the floor.  Treat your hoop kindly and it should bring you joy for a long, long time!

All images on this site are the intellectual property of Alison Fitzgerald & Hoop Mamas, LLC. Personal or Commercial use is prohibited.  All Rights Reserved © Hoop Mamas LLC.

Shop.policy_additional:
When purchasing your first Tube-O-Lights, note:

Due to the nature of the material, the tubing may have a very slight curvature to it. This curvature is often minimal and does not take away from the products greatness!

Tube-O-Lights - Storage is best in a flat location at or near room temperature 
(60-75 degrees Fahrenheit).

The LED light mechanisms are not water resistant or water proof, but are very durable!

-------------------------------

Changing the batteries: (It's easy)
 
Using a small screw driver :
Remove screw. 
Remove end plug containing light. 
Pop out the 3 button cell batteries. 
Put in the 3 new button cell batteries
( + side of the battery to + side of the light.) 
Line up holes on tube and plug,
Reinsert plug,
Reinsert screw. 
And done!

Please contact us with questions. Thank you!

results.title: Organic Wooden Toy Elephant Push Toy
results.description:
Organic Wooden Toy Elephant Push Toy 

This sweet wood toy elephant push toy is made of solid maple and is not only tough enough to withstand your teething little one, but is also fun to scoot around. This elephant is all natural and sanded so very smooth. :o)

NEW!  Choose your toy's finish: Au naturale or my homemade jojoba oil and beeswax finish!  Jojoba oil and beeswax finish is a safe, all natural wood finish that repels water, dirt and oil while bringing out the beauty and warmth of the wood.   

The Elephant measures 4" long, 3.75" tall and 2" wide.

Giving this as a gift? I’d be happy to include a note for you. Please let me know what you’d like it to say in the “note to seller” section when checking out.

To see more toys, please feel free to visit my shop!
http://www.etsy.com/shop/greenbeantoys

To view my shop policies and frequently asked questions:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/greenbeantoys/policy

Shop.title: Natural and Organic Eco Friendly Wooden Toys
Shop.announcement:
Welcome!

Natural organic Eco friendly wooden toys made in the USA. Maple Train sets Cars Trucks Animal toys handmade with care for your little ones, by a mom with little ones. Welcome to Green Bean Toys! 

NEW!  I now offer my own homemade all-natural jojoba oil and beeswax wood finish.   Jojoba oil and beeswax finish is a safe, all natural wood finish that repels water, dirt and oil while bringing out the beauty and warmth of the wood.  

FAQ'S

WHY DO YOU MAKE TOYS? 
I make and design my toys the way I do for a few reasons:
I am inspired by my children and the many children that have received my toys. I would not have this rewarding creative outlet if it wasn't for them.
I love the simplicity of wood toys. I believe that sometimes the simplest toys are the best toys.
The maple I use to make my toys is wonderful to work with, durable, beautiful and non toxic. All my toys are completely natural and are a safer alternative for our little ones.
My toys are environmentally friendly. The wood used to make my toys came from the earth and can become earth once again.
And finally, I make toys because, of course, it's super fun! :o)

HOW AND WHEN DO YOU SHIP?
I ship all orders within 5 business days.  All my orders are shipped U.S. Priority (2-3 business days) or First Class mail (2-3 business days). 

WHAT ABOUT INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING?
I ship all my international orders USPS First Class International. Unfortunately, tracking is unavailable for this method of shipping.  Please expect up to 2 weeks for delivery.

MY ORDER IS A GIFT.  WILL YOU SEND AN ORDER DIRECTLY TO THE RECIPIENT AND INCLUDE A NOTE?                                                                   
I’d be happy to!  Please provide the appropriate shipping address and be sure to include your message to the recipient in the “note to seller” section during the check out process.
Shop.vacation_message:
I am closed for Spring break, to spend some time with family and friends and to restock.  
I'll be back on April 6.
Thank you so much for stopping in... :o)
Shop.sale_message: Thank you so much for choosing Green Bean Toys for your natural wood toys!
Shop.policy_welcome:
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

WHO ARE YOU?
My name is Ann and I am from a small town in Minnesota.  I am a wife and a stay at home mother of two.  Inspired by my children, I started making toys as a creative outlet and soon after, found my way to Etsy.

WHY DO YOU MAKE TOYS? 
I make and design my toys the way I do for a few reasons:
I am inspired by my children and the many children that have received my toys. I would not have this rewarding creative outlet if it wasn't for them.
I love the simplicity of wood toys. I believe that sometimes the simplest toys are the best toys.
The maple I use to make my toys is wonderful to work with, durable, beautiful and non toxic. All my toys are completely natural and are a safer alternative for our little ones.
My toys are environmentally friendly. The wood used to make my toys came from the earth and can become earth once again.
And finally, I make toys because, of course, it's super fun! :o)

HOW CAN I CONTACT YOU?
http://www.etsy.com/conversations/new?with=greenbeantoys
Shop.policy_payment:
WHAT PAYMENT METHODS CAN I USE?
I accept credit cards through PayPal and Etsy.
Shop.policy_shipping:
HOW AND WHEN DO YOU SHIP?
I ship all orders within 5 business days.  All my orders are shipped U.S. Priority (2-3 business days) or First Class mail (3-5 business days). 

WHAT ABOUT INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING?
I ship all my international orders USPS First Class International. Unfortunately, tracking is unavailable for this method of shipping.  Please expect up to 2 weeks for delivery.

MY ORDER IS A GIFT.  WILL YOU SEND AN ORDER DIRECTLY TO THE RECIPIENT AND INCLUDE A NOTE?                                                                   
I’d be happy to!  Please provide the appropriate shipping address and be sure to include your message to the recipient in the “note to seller” section during the check out process.

WHAT TYPE OF PACKAGING DO YOU USE?
All of my orders are sent in recyclable cardboard boxes. To add extra cushioning, I use a few different types of packaging papers.
Shop.policy_refunds:
It is my wish that you and your little one will be pleased with your purchase! If for any reason you are not satisfied, please feel free to convo or email me with any concerns. 
Items may be returned for a refund or exchange within 7 days.  Buyer is responsible for shipping.
Shop.policy_additional:
DO YOU OFFER DISCOUNTS IF I PURCHASE MULTIPLE ITEMS?
Of course!  Are you interested in purchasing my toys as party favors?  I offer discounts on orders of 10 or more toys and even deeper discounts on any order of 20 or more toys.  Please convo me if you may be interested.
http://www.etsy.com/conversations/new?with=greenbeantoys

DO YOU OFFER WHOLESALE?
I am sorry.  I am unable to offer wholesale at this time.

HOW DO I CARE FOR MY ITEMS?
To keep your wooden toys safe, clean and germ-free the natural way, wipe with a cloth or a sponge that has been dampened with a solution of vinegar and water.  Allow toys to dry completely before use.  A fine grade of sandpaper can be used to smooth away rough spots or remove tough stains.  Avoid excessive moisture.

results.title: Wide Striped Navy and White Kids Teepee Tent, Play Tent, Custom Order, Poles Included
results.description:
This special teepee is navy and white stripes.  The stripes are 3" wide for a modern look, reminiscent of lighthouses and sailboats!

This teepee is over 4 feet wide and 4 feet deep at the base (each side is 50" long).  It is 5 feet tall when it is set up.  The 6 foot tall, smoothly sanded poles are included with your purchase.  The teepee poles are tied with a heavy duty leather lacing. 

Button tie backs complete the crisp, professional look of this teepee.   Definitely a conversation piece, as well as a great little hideaway, reading nook and quiet spot for your favorite imaginative play kid.  Imagine this dandy little teepee at the beach as a sun shade!  It would be a hit!!   Made with love and professionally finished for years of imaginative play.

This teepee is suitable for indoor and outdoor play.  It can be machine washed on cold, but remember that spot washing is always best, when possible.  Complete care instructions are included with your purchase.

Construction time for teepees can vary, please see my shop announcement for details.

All teepees are shipped via USPS mail in a specially made teepee box!  Guaranteed to arrive safely, it is fully assembled for immediate play.  Simply spread out the poles!

If you have a question about this item, simply click the blue "contact" button on the right hand side of this page.

Other striped teepees are available in my shop, including other wide stripe colors.  

See my ready to ship teepees here:  http://www.etsy.com/shop/TipTopTeepeeShop?section_id=13759190

Visit my playhouse shop:  www.etsy.com/shop/missprettypretty  Read my great feedback from the past 5 years here!  I am dedicated to making this shop just as successful.

Follow me on Facebook for great family activities and shop specials:  www.Facebook.com/MyFirstPlayhouse

Props contained in my photos are not included.  Just the teepee and poles!

Thank you for looking!

Shop.title: Teepees, Play Tents, Forts, Kids Tents, Tipis, Wigwams
Shop.announcement:
Teepees, Kids Tents, Forts, Play Tents, Wigwams, Tipis!  All lovingly handmade for years of imaginative play!   Buy now for Christmas!  Visit my playhouse shop, too:  www.etsy.com/shop/missprettypretty  

Ready to Ship items in this shop will ship within 48 hours (generally much sooner).  Custom order teepees construction time is currently about 3 weeks, depending on your fabric choice.  
*************************************************************************************************
Please send me a conversation BEFORE you make your purchase if you need a teepee shipped faster than my current delivery time.  Between this shop and my playhouse shop, my calendar is packed full right now.  Although I try to honor rush orders, it is not always possible, and I don't want to have to disappoint anyone!  Thank you.
**************************************************************************************************

I know how much kids love a special hideaway they can call their own, and I've been delighting the imagination of Etsy kids for many years!  Check out my playhouse shop:  www.etsy.com/shop/missprettypretty  Look at my feedback there, you can see that I am committed to creating well made playhouses and, now, teepees!!

Please contact me BEFORE you make your purchase if you need a teepee quickly for a special occasion.  I can sometimes accommodate rush orders, depending on the fabric you choose.

What makes my teepees great?  Professionally finished seams!  I don't just fold over the raw edge and stitch.  These teepees look just as good inside as they do outside.   Perfect for photo props!   They will also hold up to washing.  No exposed raw edges!!  Even if they are stitched, raw edges fray very easily when washed.  Square poles for a modern look.  Tie backs on EVERY teepee (except canvas) for no extra charge.  Kids want a teepee they can open and close during their imaginative play!

My teepees are NOT treated with any flame retardants or Scotch Guard type products. 

All teepees are shipped via USPS mail in boxes made specially for my teepees!!  Guaranteed to arrive safe and sound!

My studio and home are smoke and pet free.

Questions?  Click "contact" on the left side of this page, or email me at TipTopTeepeeShop@aol.com

Thank you for stopping by!

Owned by My First Playhouse, LLC, doing business as TipTopTeepeeShop on Etsy
Shop.sale_message: Thank you for your purchase.  If you have purchased a teepee that states it is "ready to ship", it will ship within 48 hours of purchase.  If you have purchased a "Custom Order" teepee, please see my shop announcement for construction times.  I will also send you a confirmation email once I have seen your purchase.   Please feel free to contact me via Etsy conversations or send me an email at TipTopTeepeeShop@aol.com.  Thanks again!
Shop.policy_welcome: Thank you for visiting Tip Top Teepee Shop!  See my love of imaginative play in action in my playhouse shop, too:  www.etsy.com/shop/missprettypretty
Shop.policy_payment: I accept Etsy's Direct Checkout (credit cards) and Paypal.  I do not currently accept money orders or checks.
Shop.policy_shipping: Ready to ship teepees will be shipped within 48 hours of purchase.  Custom order teepee delivery time can vary, please see my shop announcement for details.  Delivery takes 3-4 business days within the US.  All teepees are shipped in a specially made box, and are guaranteed to arrive intact.  If there are any issues with the content of your package due to shipping problems, I will replace it at my expense.
Shop.policy_refunds:
If you decide you would like to return your purchase, I will accept a return if the item is shipped back to me with delivery confirmation within 7 days of you receiving it.  The teepee (or other item) must be in the original condition.   I will return the full price of the teepee, but shipping charges are not refundable.   Return shipping is at your expense unless there was a mistake made on my end or a previously unnoticed fabric or construction flaw.  Personalized teepees are not returnable.  If you decide to return your teepee, please contact me so I can help you find the least expensive shipping method and give you more information on where/how to return the teepee.  Delivery confirmation is required when you return teepees for a refund.  I insure shipments of all of my items, so shipping loss or damages are always fully replaced at my expense.

I stand behind my business and will always do my very best to be absolutely certain my customers are satisfied with their shopping experience and purchases!

www.etsy.com/shop/TipTopTeepeeShop
www.etsy.com/shop/missprettypretty
Shop.policy_additional:
In order to continue making and selling my tee pees and playhouses, I have hired an outstanding local seamstress (JS) to help me a few hours a week with the sewing. We work together in my own home and her work is under my direct supervision at all times. The loving handmade nature of these teepees and playhouses is my number one priority, and together J and I sew magical childhood memories!!

My husband is also a big part of my playhouse team! And, yes, he does get paid!

 My patterns are copyrighted and are not to be used to make items to sell. You may feel you can use my patterns for commercial sale, but be aware that my patterns contain copyrighted original artwork that cannot legally be reproduced in any form without my permission and a licensing fee. Purchase of my patterns constitute a legal contract that you will not use the pattern or any portion of the pattern to make playhouses or toys for sale either online or locally. They are for personal use only.

results.title: Wooden Blocks Toy for Preschool Children Montessori Learning Numbers and Colors Game Waldorf
results.description:
A delightful wooden toy for preschool children, made of round blocks and dowel rods.  Children place the corresponding number and color of blocks onto the appropriate dowel rod.  Teaches colors, motor skills, and counting.

My toys are carefully handcrafted with safe and durable non-toxic glue.  I do not use nails or metal, so they are completely safe for children.  I use the safest certified non-toxic varnish available on the market, as well as non-toxic paints.  Toy measures approximately 14" x 4.25" x 5.5"

Shop.policy_shipping:
All shipping is done by first class US Mail to the United States or to Canada. This is the least costly way to ship.  

First class mail in most cases can take up to 10 business days in the USA. Due to postal cuts the shipping could take longer and during peak shipping times. Shipping from the US to Canada by first class mail takes longer. Shipping to Canada may be in excess of 30 days. Item may become delayed in customs. 

I will be shipping internationally in the new year 2012.  I will ship internationally using US first class mail. First class mail is the least costly to ship however delivery time will vary between countries and could take quite some time.  Item may be delayed in customs. Item may become wrinkled during shipping. US shipping will be shipped 1 or 2 business days from purchase date for US citizens or 3-5 days for international shipping. I do not ship on weekends or holidays. All purchases on Friday or Saturday will be shipped out on the first available Monday.

If an item becomes lost, please work with me while I try to find out what happened to the item. To find an item will take some time. Without confirmation and insurance the process will be lengthy. results.title: Personalized Teepee, Choose from 14 Colors, 6 Foot Poles Included
results.description:
You name it!  Add any name to this kids teepee tent!  Big or small letters, long or short names, above the door flaps (as shown) or vertically along the edge of a door flap!  

Choose from 14 different canvas colors for your teepee:  natural, white, hot pink, light pink, light blue, royal, red, orange, yellow, purple, turquoise, black, navy.  Canvas colors are shown in the last photo in this listing.  You can choose the color you would like the name to be, too!  Please continue reading for more information.

Your teepee will be 50" wide by 50" deep at the base.  More than 4 feet wide and deep!!  These are the inside measurements of the teepee.  The outside measurements (from pole end to pole end) are about 4" wider.  The teepee is 5 feet tall including poles when it is set up.  The poles are 6 feet tall.   This teepee is beautiful in any room in the house, in the yard, or at the beach or park for fun and shade!

My teepees are always shipped via USPS Priority Mail in a box that is specially made for my teepees!  Guaranteed to arrive safe and sound, and you can use the box for storage, if you want!  Or, just fold up the teepee and slide it under a bed or stand it in a corner until the next adventure begins.  These teepees have solid, 6 foot long, smoothly sanded poles that have been left unfinished for a timeless look. 

This teepee looks just as good outside as it does inside!  All seams are turned under and professionally finished.  No exposed raw edges!  Great for photo props, too.  

These teepees do not have ribbon tie backs or button tie backs.  The canvas is very thick, and does not "drape" nicely when it is tied back.  My kids and the kids in our neighborhood have tested the canvas teepees extensively, and I have found that they usually just fold the doors back when using the canvas teepees.  The poles are tied together with heavy duty leather lacing.  

This teepee is absolutely suitable for outdoor or indoor use.  Please remember to bring your teepee indoors during inclement or very windy weather and overnight.  Yes, canvas can be machine washed, but it you love the look and feel of heavy canvas, dry cleaning or spot washing is best.  Machine washing softens the canvas and makes it more pliable.  Complete care instructions are included with your teepee.

****************************************************************************************************************
When you check out, please do the following:

1.  Choose your canvas color from the drop down menu.
2.  Choose the name position from the drop down menu.   (Either above the door flaps, or vertically along the edge of one of the door flaps).
3.  Add the teepee to your cart.
4.  Leave the name and the fabric color you would like the name to be in the "Notes to Seller" when you check out.  Choose any color for the name!  I will find a suitable cotton print in that color.
******************************************************************************************************************

Please see my shop announcement for custom order teepee construction time.  It varies, but is usually about 2-3 weeks.

I can ship this teepee internationally without poles, including instructions on making the poles yourself.  Please contact me for details.

I have been delighting Etsy kids for 5 years! Please visit my playhouse shop: www.etsy.com/shop/missprettypretty Read my great feedback there! I am committed to making this teepee shop just as successful!

Follow me on Facebook for all kinds of fun, information about new products and discounts:
www.facebook.com/MyFirstPlayhouse

I am sorry, but the beloved props in these photos are not included.

Thank you for looking! 

Questions?  Click the blue "contact" button on any page in my shop to send me a message.

Teepee design, pattern and construction by My First Playhouse, © 2013

Shop.policy_additional:
FREQUESTLY ASKED QUESTIONS~

Here you will find a list of the most common inquiries we receive.  If you do not see what you are looking for, please message us or call 785.856.HOOP!  
 
WHAT SIZE HOOP SHOULD I CHOOSE?
When choosing a hoop, we usually recommend that you measure from the ground up to about 1-2” above your belly button. Some beginners like hoops around belly button height and some like larger hoops, all the way up to chest height.   Beginners will appreciate larger hoops so if this is your first hoop, remember that bigger is better!  The larger a hoop is, the slower it will rotate around the body, making learning new moves easier.   As you become more comfortable with hooping and are starting to build up a repertoire of tricks, you may want to slowly downsize to a smaller hoop for increased range of moves and faster speeds.  If you are a new hooper who is still unsure of the size of hoop that’s right for you, please message, call or email us your height and weight to info@hoopmamas.net and we will recommend a size for you. 

SHOULD I CHOOSE 100psi (Standard) or 160psi (Heavyweight)?
We usually recommend 100psi because it is the current standard weight in Hoopdance Hoops, but here are some other helpful guidelines:

*Reasons to choose the 160psi weight:  
     ~You have tried a friend's hoop, but can't seem to keep it up successfully.
     ~You are heavy-set or large framed and are looking for a hoop for weight loss.
     ~You are interested in waist hooping for exercise, but not necessarily any body tricks and moves.

*Reasons to choose the 100psi weight:
     ~You have successfully waist hooped with a friend's hoop.
     ~You are naturally athletic and learn new activities easily.
     ~You are interested in learning the tricks & moves associated with Hoopdance.
     
Sidenote:  There has always been talk of a heavier hoop being a better workout, although this is absolutely untrue.  The heavier the hoop, the slower it roates, making it easier to learn on, but in turn burning less calories.  The faster your body has to move with a hoop, the better workout making lighter hoops (100psi) actually better for exercise.

WILL I BE ABLE TO HOOP WITH YOUR HOOPS?
YES!!!  All Hoop Mamas Hoops are constructed of weighted tubing that is heavier and much larger than ‘your mama’s hoops’!  These larger, heavier hoops will rotate around the body much slower, allowing everyone to be successful!  We also use grip tape on every one of our hoops which allows the hoop to literally stick to your hips!  No matter your size, weight, athletic ability OR sense of rhythm, you’ll be able to spin Hoop Mamas hoops!   

HOW SHOULD I CARE FOR MY NEW HOOP?
Our hoops are durable and professionally constructed so they should last a long time with proper care.  

*Most important is WHERE you hoop.  If you hoop on grass, carpet, wood flooring or any other soft or smooth surface your hoop will be less likely to get scratched or damaged when it falls to the ground.  (And it WILL drop as you are learning)!  If your hoop is used on concrete, gravel or any other rough surface, it is likely to appear worn more quickly.  

*Temperature is also important.  Hoops are made of plastic and when they get warm they can lose their shape.  Never leave your hoop in a hot car or outside on a hot day.  If this does occur, it's okay!  Hoops can be re-shaped!  Allow the hoop to warm up in the sunshine then take the hoop indoors to set on the floor.  Treat your hoop kindly and it should bring you joy for a long, long time!

All images on this site are the intellectual property of Alison Fitzgerald & Hoop Mamas, LLC. Personal or Commercial use is prohibited.  All Rights Reserved © Hoop Mamas LLC.

results.title: Hobby Horse - Wooden Stick Horse - Waldorf Toy - Brown/Black - Hill Country Woodcraft
results.description:
Welcome to Hill Country Woodcraft! Our handmade wooden stick horses were designed and created right in our own little workshop in the Texas Hill Country. This little pony features hand stitched leather ears, a sturdy oak dowel, hand braided suede reigns, a yarn mane, and solid red oak wheels. We use a non toxic AP certified paints on the wheel base, eyes, and nose.  The very last picture is a full length shot of one of our assembled stick horses.

Each stick horse is also top coated with a natural Tung oil and beeswax finish for a beautiful hand rubbed sheen.  These toys are built to last and to hand down from generation to generation.

[Personalization]
We offer free personalization on all of our stick horses.  Please specify a name during checkout and we will happily personalize your toy for you :)

[This Horse Description]
**Mane: Two color mane: Brown/Black

results.title: Not this romantic Bear, but one like it - a plush Fuggler 25cm
results.description:
PLEASE BE AWARE THIS ITEM IS MADE TO ORDER.

These Teddies are sold. Don't despair. I'll make you another one - it won't look identical. It will be unique to you.  You can also make requests, but if they're finicky (I AM NOT HAND STITCHING AN IRON MAIDEN T-SHIRT) then I might come back to you and either ask for more money, or just nope at you until you become reasonable. Fair?

  Please state in the notes when purchasing if you want an unbroken heart/pink mouth/different colour bear/anything weird.


Please give me 6-8 weeks to get it finished. It may be sooner, but equally, if I get a tidal wave of orders all coming in at once, it may be close to the 8 week mark. If you're concerned about the time frame, please send me a message.. 

  Please use the notes when ordering to make specific requests regarding design/colours.




  It's been said that I need a hobby. Here it is. The moral of this story? Be careful what you wish for. My house is filled with these creatures now, and my husband has a sadness about it all. 

  I've called them Fugglers. You may call me Mrs McGettrick. 

Want to become a fan? Follow me on facebook:

www.facebook.com/pages/Mrs-McGettricks-Fuggler-Emporium/155586247827539

Be nice enough, and you'll probably get a Fuggler named after you :)

 SMALL PRINT: Mrs McGettrick's Fugglers are not suitable for small/medium/oral fixated children, as there is a risk that small parts could come loose and present a choking hazard. Colours may vary from the photographs, due to monitor settings, flash, and my inability to use a camera. Mrs McGettrick's Fugglers are made in a house containing a cat. A cat who pulls out her own fur in an attempt at shocking nudity, and who walks like Nosferatu. If you have cat allergies, I might suggest you avoid buying from this shop. Mrs McGettrick's Fugglers are not suitable for people who don't appreciate cuddly toys with uncannily realistic teeth jutting out from their mouths. Mrs McGettrick's Fugglers are not suitable for people who have ever harboured a suspicion that toys can come alive at night.

If paying by cheque, I can only accept cheques in GBP, due to the high costs of converting cheques from a different currency.

Shop.title: Mrs McGettrick's Fuggler Emporium
Shop.announcement:
I know why you're here. You know why you're here. You want a Fuggler. Don't deny it. Why else would a person like you be in a place like this?

  Each one of Mrs McGettrick's Fugglers is unique. Although the same template may be used again, the fabric, buttons, stitching and fake teeth will vary wildly.

  Legal Notice: You may have heard the rumour that I use human teeth. This may in fact be the only reason you have visited my shop. Shame on you. This is a TERRIBLE LIE put out by my ENEMIES in the cut throat PLUSH COMMUNITY. Those missing people have nothing to do with me. Any such allegations, or repetition of such allegations, will be dealt with swiftly and aggressively by my solicitor.

Mrs McGettrick thanks you for your understanding in this matter. Please buy a Fuggler. Buy two - keep one for a spare in case the first one mysteriously vanishes in the night, leaving behind only a note and pile of entrails, stacked like an abandoned game of jenga.
Shop.vacation_message: I'm not really on holiday, unless your idea of a holiday is drowning in felt and teeth and coffee. I've just got so many orders now that I can't in good faith take on more work when I don't know how long it will be before your Fuggler is ready. Normal service to resume soon.
Shop.sale_message:
Mrs McGettrick would like to extend her heartfelt thanks for your purchase of a Fuggler. Her husband will be most pleased when it is no longer in their house.

  Watching him while he sleeps.

  Reaching out a felt hand, and gently pawing at the arteries it sees pulsing beneath his skin.

  Mrs McGettrick would like to take this opportunity to remind you that it takes approximately 4 weeks for a made-to-order Fuggler to be conjured into being, and that Fugglers are not suitable for small children, as the small parts may present a choking hazard. 

  Thank you again for your custom. Mrs McGettrick greatly admires your money.

results.title: cheetah wooden toy waldorf cat toys eco friendly
results.description:
This little cheetah loves to play hide and seek. She's it, but only if you can catch her!

Our waldorf wooden cheetah toy is 5 3/4 inches long and 1 3/4 inches tall.


Our waldorf - style toys all begin as hand-drawn patterns unique to Outside Everywhere. The patterns are then transferred onto poplar wood and cut out in our home-workshop. We use sustainably-harvested wood, and local wood when it’s available. Our toys are sanded multiple times with several different sandpapers to ensure that our toys are super-smooth. All edges and corners are rounded to make them safe for little hands. Once our toys are smooth, we use high-quality AP certified non-toxic watercolor paints. Watercolors are amazing because they add color, but still allow the natural, beautiful grain of the wood to show through. As a safe, natural finish, we use our sweet-smelling homemade wood cream made from local beeswax and jojoba oil. Our toys will arrive to you in a small sewn eco-felt bag wrapped with string. It’s great for gift-giving and the perfect size for storing tiny treasures!

Our toys are all made-to-order. This allows us to customize or personalize orders for you! Also, since our toys are made one-at-a-time, the toy you receive will not be the exact item pictured, but it will be as similar as possible!

Custom orders are awesome and some of our favorite things to make!!

Some of our toys are small, and so they are not intended to babies or young children who may put them in their mouths. We list all of the measurements of our toys, so please read them carefully!

Also, since we use watercolor paints, the paints may bleed or fade a little if they become wet.

Shop.policy_payment: I accept PayPal, money orders and personal checks.  Personal checks must clear before item is sent.
Shop.policy_shipping: Items will be shipped within 1 to 2 business days. I use USPS, First-Class mail.  Once item is shipped, I will not be responsible for damages by carrier.  Insurance is optional
Shop.policy_refunds: Customer satisfaction is very important to me.  Please contact me if the item is not what you expected and I will refund or exchange.

All clothing is made in a smoke-free home.
Custom orders are welcome.

results.title: Hearthstone Airbrushed Plush Toy
results.description: These are wonderfully soft and will remind you of home. These are made of soft fleece, airbrushed in two colors (blue and pink) and fit in the palm of your hand. Great for a small gift or stocking stuffer. Excellent for that special gamer in your life. Thanks for viewing

results.title: Lil Jane
results.description:
This cute little gals name is jane. She is made of 100% cotton and stuffed with polyester fiberfill. Jane stands about 10" tall and will sit wherever you put her as long as he can lean against something, she's really floppy. She makes a great friend for all ages and comes with one outfit but if you would like more just let me know. Jane comes with a little sac that she can hop into so you can stick her in the washing machine for easy washing.

each additional outfit is $4

results.title: Bella the Soft Plush Easter Bunny
results.description: This cute little bunny's name is Bella. She stands 11" tall from her feet to the top of her head (not including her ears).  Bella is made of 100% cotton stuffed with polyester fiberfill.  She is wearing a fuscia cotton hat, a red fleece top, red fleece booties and blue and white checkered cotton pants. She is machine washable and comes with a mesh sac for washing. Bella makes a good friend and great easter gift for all ages (min three years of age)
